intro: Metastelma ekmanii, commonly known as the KwaZulu-Natal starling plant, is a rare and endemic species native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers that are typically blue or violet in color. The plant has narrow, lance-shaped leaves and thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in rocky or forested areas.
